Range: RML feet+Duration: 10 (MS); 30 (CS) mins

Permits the invoker to conjure a black orb about twelve inches in diameter, which hovers where created for Duration. Invoker may order the sphere to move anywhere within Range. The orb contains a pair or glowing red eyes which grant the invoker a telepathic vision of what the eyes can see. Eyes of Klyss can see in the dark at 100% vision, at 50% in torchlight or at dusk, but are blind in daylight. The orb disappears with impact from a blunt weapon or by invokers choice.
